==Useful Info==
'''Merfolk impalers''' are powerful [[list of merfolk|merfolk]] warriors who inhabit [[the Shoals]]. They carry [[brand]]ed tridents and sometimes shields. Although not too durable, their attacks are nearly twice as fast as those of most monsters, making them a significant threat in melee.

==Tips & Tricks==
*They're much more dangerous than regular merfolk, but still less of a threat than a [[merfolk javelineer]]. [[Mephitic Cloud]]ing them while they're in a crowd of their allies works very well.
*They occasionally wield [[demon trident]]s, a very nice reward for [[Polearms]]-users.

==History==
*Prior to [[0.28]], their melee attacks dealt 25 base damage.
*Prior to [[0.27]], monsters had hidden weapon penalties (they attacked slower), which made merfolk impalers less dangerous.
